2026-01-28:
Highlights

Platform Payments Expansion

Expanded platform payments with 3DS support, card redirect handling, and processor-aware execution.

Payment Method Modernization

Enhanced payment method APIs with auth codes, network transaction IDs, modular clients, and richer responses.

Reliability & Performance

Improved error propagation, optimized on-session payment flows, and fixed capture and void routing issues.

Improved error handling for redirect flows#10967

Customer and access management

Enabled connected merchant creation for platform organizations in sandbox#11039
Converted organization to platform organization#10910

Routing and core improvements

Added capture and capture-retrieve flows in relay#11014
Optimized on-session payments by avoiding unnecessary database calls#11038

2026-01-21:
Weekly Highlights

Authentication and Access Controls

Improved authentication workflows with clearer separation between platform and connected account operations, along with better authentication event integration.

Expanded Connector Capabilities

Added new connector features across order creation, split settlements, and richer request metadata for smoother integrations.

Improved Reliability and Debugging

Strengthened cancel flows, refund safety, retries, and connector error handling to make failures easier to diagnose and resolve.

Safer Refund and Post Payment Flows

Introduced validations to prevent conflicting refund scenarios and improved observability for troubleshooting post payment operations.

Stronger Request and Response Visibility

Improved response details in transaction and cancel flows to reduce guesswork during reconciliation and support investigations.

Connectors

Nordea
Enabled order creation support to unlock order first payment workflows.#10945
Xendit
Added settlement split support for card payments across multiple split routes for marketplace and platform payouts.#10916
CyberSource
Added merchant order reference id support in payment requests to improve reconciliation and tracking.#10723
WorldpayWPG
Aligned connector_request_reference_id generation back to default logic for consistent connector references.#10961
Adyen
Fixed delayed capture handling to improve stability for authorize now capture later flows.#10947
Improved mandate request compatibility by skipping serialization of empty fields.#10964
PayPal
Improved error handling to make PayPal failures easier to interpret and debug.#10942
Novalnet
Ensured connector transaction id is populated even when failures surface in 2xx responses for better reconciliation.#10901
Payjustnowinstore
Fixed callback_url placeholder values to improve callback reliability in live flows.#10937

Customer & Access Management

Clear separation between platform self operations and connected scope operations for safer permissions and cleaner audit trails.#10913
Webhook integration for Authentication Service to enable event driven monitoring and automation.#10900
Embedded tokens added to simplify authentication integration and reduce implementation complexity.#10424

Routing & Core Improvements

Introduced MIT support using Limited Card Data to strengthen recurring and merchant initiated payment use cases.#10965
Extended Cancel flow responses to include whole connector response for better debugging and support investigations.#10981
Introduced balance check support at the core layer to enable pre validation flows for balance dependent payment methods.#10896
Added dual refunds validation to prevent conflicting Chargeback + Refund flows and improve refund correctness.#10533
Generated request id for every retry attempt to improve log visibility and traceability across intermittent failures.#10919
Added authentication data field in transaction responses for better debugging and downstream visibility.#10995
Improved router error handling by returning a 4xx instead of 5xx when role info is missing in redis for more accurate failure classification.#10949
Re introduced legacy key store decryption behaviour to ensure backward compatibility for older encrypted data flows.#10899
Trimmed whitespace from phone numbers and country code inputs to reduce formatting related validation failures.#10754
